name: Celia's Castle
description:
The great vampire Celia's castle has been invaded by the legion of Hell.  Find and slay the prime evil in this bite sized metroidvania and return to feasting upon villagers once again.

Gamepad controls (recommended): 

  • Left stick - move
  • A - Jump
  • X  - Attack
  • B - Fireball (when learned)

Keyboard controls:

  • WASD - move
  • Space - Jump
  • Ctrl/L-click - Attack
  • Alt/R-click - Fireball (when learned) (might need to fullscreen if playing with keyboard)

Created as part of Vampire Themed Game Jam.

All art made by me with the exception of 0x72's character sprites.

Music is "Abstract Experimental Track#1 (looped)" by Muz Station Productions.
